metadata.title: CVE-2023-30259 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Buffer Overflow vulnerability in importshp plugin in LibreCAD 2.2.0allows attackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted DBF file.

criterions.comment: librecad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
